firstScanComplete.title: First scan complete!
firstScanComplete.body: Data has been cached. Subsequent scans for this project will be significantly faster.

analysisSettings.title: Content Analysis Settings
analysisSettings.description: Files with the extensions below will not have their content read for token counting or link analysis, which speeds up scanning.

diffModal.title: Apply Diff to '{{file}}'
diffModal.description: Paste the diff content into the text area below.
diffModal.invalidFormatError: Invalid diff format. The patch could not be applied.

multiDiffModal.title: Apply Multi-File Diff
multiDiffModal.description: Paste the content from a `git diff` or pull request. All valid patches will be applied virtually.

editorPanel.patchedTooltip: This file has a virtual patch applied.
editorPanel.applyToFileTooltip: Apply patch to the actual file

applyConfirmDialog.title: Apply Changes to File?
applyConfirmDialog.description: This will permanently overwrite the original file on your disk. This action cannot be undone.

gitPanel.notARepo: The current directory is not a Git repository.
gitPanel.title: Git History
gitPanel.checkoutCommitTooltip: Return to the state of this commit
gitPanel.author: Author

checkoutDialog.title: Confirm Checkout Commit?
checkoutDialog.description: This action will revert your project to the state of commit {{sha}}.
checkoutDialog.warning: Warning: This will put you in a "detached HEAD" state. Any uncommitted changes will be lost. Make sure you have committed or stashed your changes.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. The group "{{name}}" will be permanently deleted.

groupEditor.title: Editing: {{name}}
groupEditor.description: Select files and folders to include in the context.
groupEditor.searchPlaceholder: Search for a file or folder...
groupEditor.filterExcludedTooltip: Filter for files with excluded ranges
groupEditor.noExcludedFiles: No files with excluded ranges found.
groupEditor.filterChangedTooltip: Filter for files with Git changes
groupEditor.noChangedFiles: No files with Git changes found.

resetAllPatchesDialog.title: Discard All Patches?
resetAllPatchesDialog.description: Are you sure you want to discard all {{count}} virtual patches? This action cannot be undone.

placeholder.title: Main Panel
placeholder.selectGroupOrFile: Select a group to edit or click a file to preview

ignore.title: Custom Ignore Patterns
ignore.label: Glob patterns (one per line)
ignore.description: These patterns are used in addition to .gitignore.

deleteData.label: Delete project data
deleteData.description: This will delete all profiles, groups, and settings for this project. This cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: All data for this project (including all profiles and groups) will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

contextMode.label: Context export mode
contextMode.description: Enable to copy/export context instead of a diff file.

alwaysApply.title: Always Apply Text
alwaysApply.description: This content will be appended to every exported context file.

fullTree.label: Use full directory tree
fullTree.description: Enable to always have the full project structure in the context file.

lineNumbers.label: Add line numbers to file content
lineNumbers.description: Enable to prepend `line_number:` to each line of code.

superCompressed.label: Super compressed export
superCompressed.description: Compress file content into a single line next to the filename in the tree.

removeComments.label: Remove comments
removeComments.description: Automatically remove comment blocks from the source code to reduce tokens.

removeDebug.label: Remove debug logs
removeDebug.description: Remove `console.log`, `println!`, etc. from the source code on export.

excludeExtensions.label: Exclude extensions
excludeExtensions.description: Files with these extensions will not be included in the context file.

welcome.subtitle: A tool to manage and generate context for your projects.
welcome.clonePlaceholder: Or paste a Git repo URL to clone...

errors.fileSaveFailed: An error occurred while saving the file.
errors.fileExportFailed: An error occurred while exporting the file: {{error}}
errors.profileNameInvalid: Name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

git.uncommitted_changes: You have uncommitted changes or untracked files. Please commit, stash, or clean your working directory first.

group.export_no_files: This group contains no files to export.
group.generate_context_no_files: This group contains no files to generate context from.

profile.old_not_exist: The old profile does not exist.
profile.new_name_exist: The new profile name already exists.

project.export_no_files: The project has no files to export.
project.generate_context_no_files: The project has no files to generate context from.

sidebarPanel.title: Profiles & Groups
sidebarPanel.deleteProfileDescription: This action will permanently delete the '{{profile}}' profile and all its groups. Are you sure?
